name: lumu
label: LUMU
description: LUMU provides Real-time detection, analysis, and response to network threats.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: IP address or hostname of the LUMU server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: IP address or hostname of the LUMU server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Company Key
fields.name: company_key
fields.tooltip: Specify the API Key that you will use to access the LUMU REST API.
fields.description: Specify the API Key that you will use to access the LUMU REST API.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Incidents
operations.description: Retrieves a paginated list of incidents for the company. The items are listed by the most recent.

parameters.title: From Date
parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Specify the Search start date. The default value is 7 days before the current date. Example: 2024-04-01T14:40:14.939Z
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Search start date. The default value is 7 days before the current date. Example: 2024-04-01T14:40:14.939Z

parameters.title: To Date
parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Specify the Search end date. The default value is the current date. Example: 2021-04-07T14:40:14.939Z
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Search end date. The default value is the current date. Example: 2021-04-07T14:40:14.939Z

parameters.title: Incident Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Incident status. If not specified, all objects are returned.
parameters.description: Specify the Incident status. If not specified, all objects are returned.

parameters.title: Adversary Type
parameters.name: adversary-types
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Adversary types. If not specified, all objects are returned.
parameters.description: Specify the Adversary types. If not specified, all objects are returned.

parameters.title: Labels
parameters.name: labels
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Label IDs in Comma separated Format. You may previously use the label API call to retrieve label IDs and names. If not specified, all objects are returned. Example: 2, 3, 5
parameters.description: Specify the Label IDs in Comma separated Format. You may previously use the label API call to retrieve label IDs and names. If not specified, all objects are returned. Example: 2, 3, 5

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Page number of the result set.Default value is : 1
parameters.description: Specify the Page number of the result set.Default value is : 1

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: items
parameters.tooltip: Limit the number of results per page. Default value is : 50, Max value can be : 100
parameters.description: Limit the number of results per page. Default value is : 50, Max value can be : 100

operations.title: Get Incident by UUID
operations.description: Retrieves a details of a specific Incident. The response for this operation may include extra data ( DNSPacketExtraInfo for example) in its parameters which may vary according to the data collection source

parameters.title: Incident UUID
parameters.name: incident_uuid
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Incident UUID whose details you want to Fetch
parameters.description: Specify the Incident UUID whose details you want to Fetch

operations.title: Get Incident Context
operations.description: Retrieves details of the context information from a specific Incident

parameters.title: Incident UUID
parameters.name: incident_uuid
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Incident UUID whose context details you want to Fetch
parameters.description: Specify the Incident UUID whose context details you want to Fetch

parameters.title: Hash Type
parameters.name: hash
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Message-digest algorithm (Cryptographic Hash Function) you are requesting, can correspond to SHA256, SHA1 or MD5. If a hash type isn't requested, this will return a SHA256 hash by default. This parameter isn't case sensitive
parameters.description: Specify the Message-digest algorithm (Cryptographic Hash Function) you are requesting, can correspond to SHA256, SHA1 or MD5. If a hash type isn't requested, this will return a SHA256 hash by default. This parameter isn't case sensitive

operations.title: Get Incident Endpoints
operations.description: Retrieves a paginated summary of the endpoints affected by a specified incident

parameters.title: Incident UUID
parameters.name: incident_uuid
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Incident UUID whose Endpoints details you want to Fetch
parameters.description: Specify the Incident UUID whose Endpoints details you want to Fetch

parameters.title: Endpoint IDs
parameters.name: endpoints
parameters.tooltip: Specify the List of ID of contacting endpoints. If not specified, all objects are returned. Example: 182.168.100.29, DESK-9867
parameters.description: Specify the List of ID of contacting endpoints. If not specified, all objects are returned. Example: 182.168.100.29, DESK-9867

parameters.title: Labels
parameters.name: labels
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Label IDs in Comma separated Format. You may previously use the label API call to retrieve label IDs and names. If not specified, all objects are returned. Example: 2, 3, 5
parameters.description: Specify the Label IDs in Comma separated Format. You may previously use the label API call to retrieve label IDs and names. If not specified, all objects are returned. Example: 2, 3, 5

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Page number of the result set.Default value is : 1
parameters.description: Specify the Page number of the result set.Default value is : 1

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: items
parameters.tooltip: Limit the number of results per page. Default value is : 50, Max value can be : 100
parameters.description: Limit the number of results per page. Default value is : 50, Max value can be : 100

operations.title: Close Incident
operations.description: Closes a LUMU Incident according to Incident UUID and comment provided

parameters.title: Incident UUID
parameters.name: incident_uuid
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Incident UUID which you want to close
parameters.description: Specify the Incident UUID which you want to close

parameters.title: Comment
parameters.name: comment
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Comment to be added in the Incident log. Example: Internal penetration tests
parameters.description: Specify the Comment to be added in the Incident log. Example: Internal penetration tests
